title.trans: Please enter amount ye want t' deposit
title.eng: Please enter amount you want to deposit

detail.trans: ${amount} bitcoin will be deposit into yer gan account, this cannot be reversed
detail.eng: ${amount} bitcoin will be deposit into your gang account, this cannot be reversed

noClan.trans: No gang has occupied this area yet
noClan.eng: No gang has occupied this area yet

description.trans: This content is contributed by the community. click here to contribute your own content.
description.eng: This content is contributed by the community. click here to contribute your own content.

description.trans: processing
description.eng: processing

description.trans: Ye found a locked loot box wit' color keypad, ye best be able t' unlock it wit' the correct sequence o' colors.
description.eng: You found a locked loot box with color keypad, you should be able to unlock it with the correct sequence of colors.

description.trans: Jab on the correct color sequence t' unlock
description.eng: Click on the correct color sequence to unlock

description.trans: People of Ukraine, Russia and the whole world are suffering because one man's ambition.\n Make love exploit, not war.
description.eng: People of Ukraine, Russia and the whole world are suffering because one man's ambition.\n Make love exploit, not war.

withdrawDesc.trans: Take yer Doubloons out of bank

putItemToVaultDesc.trans: Put yer items into ye safe

takeItemFromVaultDesc.trans: Take yer items out from ye safe
takeItemFromVaultDesc.eng: Take items out from your vault

upgradeSlotDesc.trans: Increase th' max amount o' items ye can store in safe t' ${upgradeToSlot}
upgradeSlotDesc.eng: Increase the max amount of items you can store in vault to ${upgradeToSlot}

selectDepositItem.trans: How many item would ye like t' put in th' safe?
selectDepositItem.eng: How many would you like to put in the vault?

selectWithdrawItem.trans: How many item would ye like t' take from th' bank?
selectWithdrawItem.eng: How many would you like to withdraw from the bank?

selectDeposit.trans: How much would ye like t' put?
selectDeposit.eng: How much would you like to deposit?

selectWithdraw.trans: How much would ye like t' take?
selectWithdraw.eng: How much would you like to withdraw?

noBalance.trans: Ye can't withdraw when no doubloon on ye.
noBalance.eng: You can't withdraw when you have no balance.

story.trans: Ye found an barnacle-covered locked safe box, there seems like a post-it wit' some text written on it.
story.eng: You found an old locked safe box, there seems like a post-it with some text written on it.

notAtBottom.trans: You are looking at old messages
notAtBottom.eng: You are looking at old messages

spamBlock.trans: Please dern't send meaningless message, spams will be muted.
spamBlock.eng: Please do not send meaningless message, spams will be muted.

repeatBlock.trans: Please dern't send th' same message repeatedly, spams will be muted.
repeatBlock.eng: Please do not send the same message repeatedly, spams will be muted.

shortChatBlock.trans: Please dern't send short messages, try a longer sentence instead.
shortChatBlock.eng: Please do not send short messages, try a longer sentence instead.

underlevelChatBlock.trans: Ye need t' be at least le'el ${minLevel} t' send chat messages
underlevelChatBlock.eng: You need to be at least level ${minLevel} to send chat messages

title.trans: ${name} is about to run out in a few seconds!
title.eng: ${name} is about to run out in a few seconds!

lowPrintLevelTip2.trans: Increase yer Printin' Rank t' create more powerful weapons by printin' more caches
lowPrintLevelTip2.eng: Increase your Printing Rank to create more powerful weapons by printing more caches

lowPrintLevelTip3.trans: Or by auto print and selling your caches in the Black Market
lowPrintLevelTip3.eng: Or by auto print and selling your caches in the Black Market

title.trans: Select a usable item t' bind t' yer quick slot
title.eng: Select a usable item to bind to a quick slot

description.trans:
Global Skip allow ye t' skip th' AFK waitin' time, an' finish it instantly.
    this effect will be applied t' all crewmate performin' AFK task
description.eng:
Global Skip allow you to skip the AFK waiting time, and finish it instantly.
    this effect will be applied to all player performing AFK task

description.trans: Use one o' yer ${timeSkipItemName} t' skip ${itemSkipMinutes} minutes
description.eng: Use one of your ${timeSkipItemName} to skip ${itemSkipMinutes} minutes

subtitle.trans: Global Skip will skip th' waitin' time fer all crewmates performin' AFK task
subtitle.eng: Global Skip will skip the waiting time for all players performing AFK task

description.trans:
Global Skip allow ye t' skip th' AFK waitin' time, an' finish it instantly.
    this effect will be applied t' all crewmate performin' AFK task
description.eng:
Global Skip allow you to skip the AFK waiting time, and finish it instantly.
    this effect will be applied to all players performing an AFK task

description.trans: There be no community lore fer this item yet, be th' first t' create one fer it.
description.eng: There is no community lore for this item yet, be the first to create one for it.

description.trans: Open th' community lore fer this item
description.eng: Open the community lore for this item

description.trans: Edit tharr community lore
description.eng: Edit this community lore

instruction.trans: 'Tis item be broken, brin' it t' Weapon Fettlin' fer repair
instruction.eng: This item is broken, bring it to Weapon Smith for repair

areaEffect.trans: [AOE] Area o' Effect, th' effect o' 'tis item will apply crewmates in combat wit' ye.
areaEffect.eng: [AOE] Area of Effect, the effect of this item will apply allies in combat with you.

cantEquip.trans: Your level is too low for this item
cantEquip.eng: Your level is too low for this item

confirmation.trans:
Doin' this will reset all calibration on yer item, also make it tradable again. 
      Be ye sure ye want t' proceed?
confirmation.eng:
Doing this will reset all calibration on your item. It will also make it tradable again. 
      Are you sure you want to proceed?

noKeysTitle.trans: Ye dern't ha'e any secret keys
noKeysTitle.eng: You don't have any secret keys

noKeysSubtitle.trans: Ye can obtain secret keys from Dungeons
noKeysSubtitle.eng: You can obtain secret keys from Dungeons

longPressBackToCity.trans: Long press t' go back t' city
longPressBackToCity.eng: Long press to go back to city

hiddenNpcTip.trans: ${hiddenCount} more interactables can be unlocked at this location, le'el up t' unlock them.
hiddenNpcTip.eng: ${hiddenCount} more interactables can be unlocked at this location, level up to unlock them.

notUnlocked.trans: 'Tis be not unlocked yet, try le'el up yer character
notUnlocked.eng: This is not unlocked yet, try leveling up your character

repairItems.trans: Repair all yer items (cost ye ${repairFee} Doubloon)

description.trans: equipment printin' be based on yer printin' rank, level up yer printin' rank by printin' more items
description.eng: equipment printing is based on your printing rank, level up your printing rank by printing more items

title.trans: Be ye sure ye want t' weigh anchor 'tis dungeon?
title.eng: Are you sure you want to leave this dungeon?

subtitle.trans: Ye will not be able t' enter 'tis dungeon instance again
subtitle.eng: You will not be able to enter this dungeon instance again

increaseSlotDescription.trans: Spend Doubloons t' increase how many items ye can put in yer stall at th' same time
increaseSlotDescription.eng: Spend Bitcoins to increase how many items you can put in your stall at the same time

cantEnterError.trans: Ye need t' be at least le'el 4 t' access th' market
cantEnterError.eng: You need to be at least level 4 to access the market

noItems.trans: Arr! tharr be currently no items on sale fer this category. Best be damn luck later, ya stroll!
noItems.eng: there is currently no items on sale for this category

selectItemForSale.trans: Please select th' item ye want t' sell
selectItemForSale.eng: Please select the item you want to sell

newbieTip.trans: Th' task will continue even if ye close th' game
newbieTip.eng: The task will continue even if you close the game

abortWarningTitle.trans: Are you sure you want to abort?
abortWarningTitle.eng: Are you sure you want to abort?

abortWarning.trans: By abortin' this ye won\'t recei'e any reward an' th' material used won\'t be returned
abortWarning.eng: By aborting this you won\'t receive any reward and the material used won\'t be returned

description.trans: Printing Rank determines the level of item you print. Gain printing exp by print & sell in Black Market
description.eng: Printing Rank determines the level of item you print. Gain printing exp by print & sell in Black Market

description.trans: Your current equipment seems abit outdated for your level, try printing stronger ones to replace them
description.eng: Your current equipment seems abit outdated for your level, try printing stronger ones to replace them

description.trans: You can upgrade your equipment by using the ${itemName}
description.eng: You can upgrade your equipment by using the ${itemName}

description.trans: Looks like you have some AI Cores, use them to do AFK auto leveling in appropriate level area.
description.eng: Looks like you have some AI Cores, use them to do AFK auto leveling in appropriate level area.

description.trans:
You may get AI Cores by: 
        - Scavenge in various locations
        - Crafting with Hash Processors and Tech Scraps
        - Looting from enemies in all locations
description.eng:
You may get AI Cores by: 
        - Scavenge in various locations
        - Crafting with Hash Processors and Tech Scraps
        - Looting from enemies in all locations

subtitle.trans: Join force wit' other Netrunners t' breach th' SL-Data Fortress t' grant all crewmates wit' buff
subtitle.eng: Join forces with other Netrunners to breach the SL-Data Fortress to grant all players with buff

description.trans: Yer account has been suspended automatically by the system due t' Unusual Acti'ity
description.eng: Your account has been suspended automatically by the system due to Unusual Activity

2.trans: 1. You created multiple accounts to gain unfair advantage
2.eng: 1. You created multiple accounts to gain unfair advantage

3.trans: 2. You have used some kind of automated software to gain unfair advantage, such as autoclicker, bots, etc.
3.eng: 2. You have used some kind of automated software to gain unfair advantage, such as autoclicker, bots, etc.

4.trans: 3. System has detected unusual network activity
4.eng: 3. System has detected unusual network activity

content.trans: If ye 'ave any riddles please feel free t' contact Dexter directly via official Discord (Link can be found in Floatin' Menu -> Links) or email t' ching.huang.dexter@gmail.com
content.eng: If you have any questions please feel free to contact Dexter directly via official Discord (Link can be found in Floating Menu -> Links) or email to ching.huang.dexter@gmail.com

description.eng: Click to get new tips

notUnlocked.trans: Ye ha'e not unlocked this area yet
notUnlocked.eng: You have not unlocked this area yet

langWarning.eng: This language pack is open source and contributed by our players, the text may not be fully translated and could contain mistakes. please feel free to edit and contribute from our Github page

description.eng: Disabling attack timing bar will not grant extra damage

description.eng: Disable if chat tab lags during skips

restartRequired.trans: Tharr app will restart afterr sa'in
restartRequired.eng: App will self restart after save

cantEnterError.eng: You need to be at least level 2 to access the job hub

title.eng: Are you sure you want to calibrate this item with ${percent}% destructive failure chance?

title.trans: Enterr tharr system passcode t' proceed

des.trans: In dungeons, ye will not heal aft each fight, an' enemies be stronger, but there be more exp an' booty
des.eng: In dungeons, you will not heal after each fight, and enemies are stronger, but there are more exp and loots

des.trans: Dungeons be currently under maintenance, Cap'n Dexter be workin' on bringin' them back as soon as possible!
des.eng: Dungeons are currently under maintenance, Dexter is working on bringing them back as soon as possible!

noHealingPrompt.trans: Maybe buy some healin' item first, ya scurvy dog!?
noHealingPrompt.eng: Maybe buy some healing item first?

des.trans: Seems like ye dont ha'e any Pain Away wit' ye, purchase it from Trinoky Mart in th' city first before enterin' dungeons, since ye will not regen aft battles in dungeon
des.eng: Seems like you dont have any Pain Away with you, purchase it from Trinoky Mart in the city first before entering dungeons, since you will not regen after battles in dungeon

description.eng: Only check if you have a referer (Optional)

description.eng: Please search and select the player who referred you

description.eng: You have set ${name} as your referer

description.trans: Ye will be muted if ye use offensive or inappropriate names.
description.eng: you will be muted if you use an offensive or inappropriate name.

description.eng: You cannot change this in the future

confirmKickMember.trans: Be ye sure ye want t' walk tharr plank yer crewmate from yer gan?
confirmKickMember.eng: are you sure you want to kick this player from your gang?

description.eng: If you have a coupon from one of our events, you can claim it here.

placeholder.eng: Paste or enter your coupon here

onlyShowCraftable.trans: Hide recipes that you can\'t craft
onlyShowCraftable.eng: Hide recipes that you can\'t craft

equipmentBrokenMsg.eng: ${equipmentName} is broken, repair it at the Weapon Smith in the City

showCanJoinOnly.trans: Only show dungeons me could've join
showCanJoinOnly.eng: Only show dungeons I can join

noDungeon.trans: Nay public dungeon at th' moment
noDungeon.eng: There is currently no public dungeon

activateDescription.trans: A Calibration Core be required t' calibrate equipment
activateDescription.eng: A Calibration Core is required to calibrate equipment

description.trans: Ye may leave this page 'n come back later
description.eng: You may leave this page and come back later

selectEquipmentTitle.eng: Please select an item to calibrate

description1.trans: CyberCode Online be an online game, an account be needed t' store yer game data.
description1.eng: CyberCode Online is an online game, an account is needed to store game data.

description2.trans: please register or login wit' existin' account
description2.eng: please register or login with existing account

asusDescription.trans: ASUS phone (Zenfone, ROG) has bug with screen being not clickable, in the case, please try turning your screen off and on again, or put this app to background and resume it again. this should fix the issue :)
asusDescription.eng: ASUS phone (Zenfone, ROG) has bug with screen being not clickable, in the case, please try turning your screen off and on again, or put this app to background and resume it again. this should fix the issue :)

description.trans: Items here will be automatically moved t' yer in'entory once ye ha'e enough space.
description.eng: Items here will be automatically moved to your inventory once you have enough space.

empty.trans: There be no item in yer item inbox
empty.eng: There is no item in your item inbox

desc.trans: Scans fer broadside enemies on th' river, enemies outside dungeons be weaker an' easier t' defeat. However they also drop less exp
desc.eng: Scans for nearby enemies on the street, enemies outside dungeons are weaker and easier to defeat. However they also drop less exp

levelRequiredToChat.trans: You need to be at least level ${level} to chat
levelRequiredToChat.eng: You need to be at least level ${level} to chat

subTitle.trans: gather th' caches from enemies an' dungeons t' print yer new weapons an' armor
subTitle.eng: gather the caches from enemies and dungeons to print your new weapons and armor

placeholder.trans: Enter yer character name t' delete yer journey
placeholder.eng: Enter your character name to delete

title.trans: Be ye sure ye want t' delete yer journey, avast? This be irreversible, all information will be removed.
title.eng: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This is irreversible, all account information will be removed.

hasSpace.trans: Ye Name can't contain spaces, ye may replace th' space wit' "_"
hasSpace.eng: Name cannot contain spaces, you may replace the space with "_"

tooShort.trans: Ye Name must be at least 4 characters long
tooShort.eng: Name must be at least 4 characters long

tooLong.trans: Ye Name must be less than 16 characters long
tooLong.eng: Name must be less or equal to 16 characters long

invalidChar.trans: Ye Name can only contain English letters, numbers an' "_"
invalidChar.eng: Name can only contain English letters, numbers and "_"

description.trans: Ye can contribute t' th' lore o' items too by editin' th' config file in our GitHub page.
description.eng: You can contribute to the lore of items too by editing the config file in our GitHub page.

requireGang.trans: Requires ye t' be in a gan'
requireGang.eng: Requires you to be in a gang

requireTopGang.trans: Requires ye t' be in th' Top 2 Gan's on th' Occupation Leaderboard
requireTopGang.eng: Requires you to be in the Top 2 Gangs on the Occupation Leaderboard

description.trans: Maximum health capacity
description.eng: Maximum health capacity

description.trans: Increases maximum health
description.eng: Increases maximum health

description.trans: Decrease damage taken from enemies
description.eng: Decreases damage taken from enemies

description.trans: Amount o' health regenerated afterr end o' combat
description.eng: Amount of health regenerated after the end of combat

description.trans: Directly influences amount o' damage ye deal
description.eng: Directly influences the amount of damage dealt by you

description.trans: Chance o' executin a critical attack
description.eng: Chance of you executing a critical attack

description.trans: Influence tharr critical attack damage ye deal t' tharr enemy
description.eng: Influence the critical attack damage you deal to the enemy

description.trans: Increases yerr shield capacity
description.eng: Increases your shield capacity

description.trans: Chance o' ye escapin from a dungeon enemy
description.eng: Chances of you escaping from a dungeon enemy

description.trans:
Chance o' ye stunnin yerr enemy when dealin damage, 
    causin 'em t' lose tharr ability t' respond t' yerr attack
description.eng:
Chance of you stunning your enemy when dealing damage, 
    causing them not able to respond to your attack

description.trans: Chance o' ye dodgin a enemies attack
description.eng: Chance of you dodging an enemies attack

description.trans: Influences tharr price when buyin an' sellin from npc's orr stores.
description.eng: Influences the price when buying and selling from npc's or stores.

description.trans: Increases in'entory capacity
description.eng: Increases inventory capacity

description.trans: Increases damage by percentage
description.eng: Increases damage by percentage

description.trans: Decreases damage recei'ed by percentage
description.eng: Decreases damage received by percentage

description.trans: Decreases chances o' gettin stunned
description.eng: Decreases chance of getting stunned

description.trans: Increases strength o' shield by percentage
description.eng: Increase strength of shield by percentage

description.trans: Increases tharr potency o' yerr heals
description.eng: Increases the potency of your heals

description.trans: Reduce time required t' complete a AFK task
description.eng: Reduce AFK task required time

description.trans: Increase EXP ye recei'e
description.eng: Increase EXP you receive

description.trans: Increase the doubloons ye recei'e
description.eng: Increase Bitcoins you receive

description.trans: Reduces chance o' destructi'e failure when calibrating yer items
description.eng: Reduces chance of destructive failure when calibrating items

description.eng: Calibration fails will not destroy the item

description.eng: Additional epic drop chance from containers

description.eng: Increases damage to Enemies of Animals gang

description.eng: Increases damage to Enemies of Voodoo Boys gang

description.eng: Increases damage to Enemies of Scavengers gang

description.eng: Enemies of Scavengers gang deals increased damage to you

noSpace.trans: There is no enough space in your in'entory for ${item}
noSpace.eng: There is no enough space in your inventory for ${item}

title.trans: be ye sure ye want t' discard?
title.eng: Are you sure you want to discard?

warning.trans: Th' item/items above will be discarded an' not be placed into yer in'entory. 'Tis action be irreversible.
warning.eng: The item/items above will be discarded and not be placed into your inventory. This action is irreversible.

description.trans: keel-haul some enemies an' get a full set o' items fer ye t' start yer journey
description.eng: Kill some enemies and get a full set of items for you to start your journey

description.trans:
Welcome to CyberCode Online,
        makin' maties wit' people online will be very useful fer ye t' complete co-op quests,
       go ahead ask people online if ye have got any questions :)
        Remember, if ye spam in th' chat, ye will be muted by moderators.
description.eng:
Welcome to CyberCode Online,
        making friends with people online will be very useful for you to complete co-op quests,
        go ahead ask people online if you have got any questions :)
        Remember, if you spam in the chat, you will be muted by moderators.

description.trans:
th' le'el o' itemS ye print wit' Caches be determined by yer Printin' Rank,
        le'el up yer Printin' Rank so ye can print higher level items.
        
        Ye can find Molecular 3D Printer at [Central Hub], use it t' print some caches t' level up yer Printin' Rank
description.eng:
The level of itemS you print with Caches are determined by your Printing Rank,
        level up your Printing Rank so you can print higher level items.
        
        You can find Molecular 3D Printer at [Central Hub], use it to print some caches to level up your Printing Rank

description.trans: Open 4 crates in dungeon t' get them sweet loots!
description.eng: Open 4 crates in dungeon to get them sweet loots!

description.trans: Ye can sell an' purchase items from crewmates in th' matey market, try it out by addin' an item t' th' matey market
description.eng: You can sell and purchase items from players in the player market, try it out by adding an item to the player market

description.trans:
Acquire 3 different Key Fragments from each dungeons located in ${segmentDisplayName},
                these be used t' create th' key t' next zone.
                To craft th' key, go t' terminal in [HUB]
description.eng:
Acquire 3 different Key Fragments from each dungeons located in ${segmentDisplayName},
                these are used to create the key to next zone.
                To craft the key, go to terminal in [HUB]

abandonConfirm.trans: Be ye sure ye want t' abandon tharr quest?
abandonConfirm.eng: Are you sure you want to abandon this quest?

localCombatButton.trans: Click here t' scan fer river enemies
localCombatButton.eng: Click here to scan for street enemies

ye will recei'e exp, Doubloon an' booty  when ye defeat enemies,
                give it a try now!
localCombatTip.eng:
you will receive exp, Bitcoin and loots when you defeat enemies,
                give it a try now!

primaryAttack.eng: Click here to attack the enemy

statusInv.trans: Click 'TAKE ALL' t' get all th' booty
statusInv.eng: Click 'TAKE ALL' to get all the loots

dungeonQuest.eng: Click 'ACCEPT QUEST' to accept the quest, you may complete or abandon the quest at any time

paypalBonusTitle.trans: All PayPal purchases grants 10% additional Units, by Blackbeard's sword! ye may use paypal only on website version, simply login wit yer browser.
paypalBonusTitle.eng: All PayPal purchases grants 10% additional Units! You may use paypal only on website version, simply login with your browser.

paypalBonus.trans: Ye will recei'e additional 10% more Units wit paypal purchase
paypalBonus.eng: You will receive additional 10% more Units with paypal purchase

3.trans: Basic Chat Frame (nay animation & nay special color)
3.eng: Basic Chat Frame (no animation & no special color)

12.trans: Did me mention ye could be a Cybernetic Potato?
12.eng: Did I mention you could be a Cybernetic Potato?

description.trans: deals increased damage t' Animals gang. receives increased damage from Scavengers gang.
description.eng: deals increased damage to Animals gang. receives increased damage from Scavengers gang.

description.trans: deals increased damage t' Voodoo Boys gang. receives increased damage from Animals gang.
description.eng: deals increased damage to Voodoo Boys gang. receives increased damage from Animals gang.

description.trans: deals increased damage t' Scavengers gang. receives increased damage from Voodoo Boys gang.
description.eng: deals increased damage to Scavengers gang. receives increased damage from Voodoo Boys gang.

description.trans:
Commercially used Neural Processin Unit (NPU). Hails wit' general purpose AI. 
        Ye can use 'tis t' deploy a bot that farms dungeons ferr ye.
description.eng:
Commercially used Neural Processing Unit (NPU). Comes with general purpose AI. 
        You can use this to deploy a farming bot to dungeon for you.

description.trans: AI Core Cluster contains 1000 AI Cores. can be easily assembled and disassembled.
description.eng: AI Core Cluster contains 1000 AI Cores. can be easily assembled and disassembled.

description.trans: A portable energy storage de'ice, can be used as consumable ammo ferr yerr Special Weapons
description.eng: Portable energy storage device, it can be used as consumable ammo for your Special Weapons

description.trans:
A High-tech, miniaturized, one-time use, antimatterr energy generator. 
        'Tis item produces enormous amounts o' power. Ye can use dis as ammunition ferr yerr destructi'e weapon.
description.eng:
High-tech, miniaturized, one-time use, antimatter energy generator. 
        This item produces enormous amounts of power. You can use this as ammunition for your destructive weapon.

description.trans:
Ammunition tech parts, can be commonly found circulatin in tharr black market. 
        Ye can use these t' craft ammunition if ye know how.
description.eng:
Ammunition tech parts, These can be commonly found circulating the black market. 
        You can use these to craft ammunition if you understand how.

description.trans: Military grade ammunition tech parts, commonly used by go'ernment, military an' tharr elites,can be used t' craft into usable Ammo if ye ha'e tharr knowledge t' d' so
description.eng: Military grade ammunition tech parts, commonly used by government, military and the elites,can be used to craft into usable Ammo if you have the know-how

description.trans:
Technology scrap from disassembled equipment, dis can be re'erse engineered t' gain printin xp. 
        Ye can perform re'erse engineerin in tharr Job Hub.
description.eng:
Technology scrap from disassembled equipment, this can be reverse engineered to gain printing xp. 
        You can perform reverse engineering in the Job Hub.

description.trans: Memory bank contains someone's memories, if used ye may gain experience from 'tis

description.trans:
Can be used as dedicated hardware ferr Doubloon mining, 
        howe'err due t' o'erclocking, tharr processorr will easily burn out,
        Ye may use 'tis t' mine Doubloons at [JOB HUB]
description.eng:
Can be used as a dedicated hardware for BitCoin mining, 
        however due to overclocking, the processor is easily burntout,
        You may use this to mine BitCoin at [JOB HUB]

description.trans:
Broadcasts exploits t' all cybernetically connected users, o'erclockin theirr synaptic processors thus allowin super-human mental capacity ferr a short period o' time.
        
        When used, gi'es a Global Buff t' all players online, allowin 'em t' complete AFK tasks in +5% speed ferr 10 minutes (stackable)
description.eng:
Broadcasts exploits to all cybernetically connected users, overclocking their synaptic processors thus allowing super-human mental capacity for short period of time.
        
        When used, gives Global Buff to all players online, allowing them to complete AFK tasks in +5% speed for 10 minutes (stackable)

description.trans:
Broadcasts exploits t' all cybernetically connected users, o'erclockin theirr synaptic processors thus allowin super-human mental capacity ferr short period o' time.
        
        When used, gi'es a Global Buff t' all players online, allowin 'em t' complete AFK tasks in +40% speed ferr 20 minutes (stackable)

Broadcasts exploits to all cybernetically connected users, overclocking their synaptic processors thus allowing super-human mental capacity for short period of time.
        
        When used, gives Global Buff to all players online, allowing them to complete AFK tasks in +40% speed for 20 minutes (stackable)

description.trans:
Broadcasts exploits t' all cybernetically connected users, enhancin theirr Frontal Cortex integration wit' cyberwares installed, thus increasin tharr memory capability o' tharr user.

        When used, gi'es a Global Buff t' all players online, increases EXP gained t' 180% ferr 20 minutes
description.eng:
Broadcasts exploits to all cybernetically connected users, enhancing their Frontal Cortex integration with cyberwares installed, thus increasing memory capability of the user.

        When used, gives Global Buff to all players online, increase EXP gained to 180% for 20 minutes

description.trans:
Broadcasts exploits t' all cybernetically connected users, augments theirr transaction algorithm temporary, allowin userr t' recei'e bonus  ${currencyName}.

        When used, gi'es a Global Buff t' all players online, increases BitCoin gained by 40% ferr 20 minutes (stackable)
description.eng:
Broadcasts exploits to all cybernetically connected users, argument their transaction algorithm temporary, allowing user to receive bonus  ${currencyName}.

        When used, gives Global Buff to all players online, increase BitCoin gained by 40% for 20 minutes (stackable)

description.trans:
A reinforced containerr wit' a biometric encryption lock, it seems t' contain important items inside.
        Luckily tharr on board micro computerr be runnin on out-dated firmware, so a exploit be possible, sail t' [Terminal] t' unlock dis containerrr
description.eng:
A reinforced container with biometric encryption lock, it seems to contain important items inside.
        Luckily the on board micro computer is running on out-dated firmware, where an exploit is possible, go to [Terminal] to unlock this container

description.trans:
A reinforced containerr wit' a biometric encryption lock, it seems t' contain important items inside.
        Luckily tharr on board micro computerr be runnin on out-dated firmware, so a exploit be possible, sail t' [Terminal] t' unlock dis containerrr

A reinforced containerr wit' a biometric encryption lock, it seems t' contain important items inside.

description.trans:
A simple transmitter device that can be bind t' yer gang encrypted channel and give out invasion order.
        'Tis item be required t' activate Gan' Dungeons
description.eng:
A simple transmitter device that can be bind to your gang encrypted channel and give out invasion order.
        This item is required to activate Gang Dungeons

description.trans:
Contains misc items and resources fer a gang t' stay functional,
        Click use t' send it t' yer gang headquarters
description.eng:
Contains misc items and resources for a gang to stay functional,
        Click use to send it to your gang headquarters

description.trans:
A memory shard contains encrypted gang secrets, 
        decrypt this in yer gang headquarters t' gain useful intel (requires t' be in a gang)
description.eng:
A memory shard contains encrypted gang secrets, 
        decrypt this in your gang headquarters to gain useful intel (requires to be in a gang)

description.trans: A black market memory shard contains highly encrypted algorithm and schematic that be crucial in th' process o' upgradin' equipments
description.eng: A black market memory shard contains highly encrypted algorithm and schematic that is crucial in the process of upgrading equipments

description.trans: Contains fragments o' ad'ance AI designed t' assist wit' upgradin' equipments. When used, decreases the chance o' destructi'e failure by ${percent}% (stackable) fer ${duration} minutes
description.eng: Contains fragments of advance AI designed to assist with upgrading equipments. When used, decreases the chance of destructive failure by ${percent}% (stackable) for ${duration} minutes

description.trans: Contains fragments o' ad'ance AI designed t' assist wit' upgradin' equipments. When used, decreases the chance o' destructi'e failure by ${percent}% (stackable fer ${maxStack} times) fer ${duration} minutes.This effect will apply t' all crewmates online
description.eng: Contains fragments of advance AI designed to assist with upgrading equipments. When used, decreases the chance of destructive failure by ${percent}% (stackable for ${maxStack} times) for ${duration} minutes.This effect will apply to all players online

description.trans:
Contains fragments o' advance AI designed t' assist wit' upgradin' equipments.
        When used, decreases th' chance o' destructive failure by 50% fer 5 minutes. tharr only affect yourself.
        Ye can calibrate items in yer Gan' Headquarters, ye must join or start a gang first.
description.eng:
Contains fragments of advance AI designed to assist with upgrading equipments.
        When used, decreases the chance of destructive failure by 50% for 5 minutes. this only affect yourself.
        You can calibrate items in your Gang Headquarters, you must join or start a gang first.

description.trans:
Experimental nano machines designed t' reduces and negate th' destructi'e effect when failin' calibration, 
        when this be activated, all calibration fails will not destroy th' item fer 5 minutes
description.eng:
Experimental nano machines designed to reduces and negate the destructive effect when failing calibration, 
        when this is activated, all calibration fails will not destroy the item for 5 minutes (Applies to all players)

description.trans:
A forgotten ancient pouch, 
        tharr is a weird cartoon frog wit' big mouth an' red lips drawing at the side of it,
        th' meanin' o' th' ancient ominous drawin' be unknown, but it be handy fer keep some small object in it.
        increase in'entory space when equipped.
description.eng:
A forgotten ancient pouch, 
        there is a weird cartoon frog with big mouth and red lips drawing at the side of it,
        the meaning of the ancient ominous drawing is unknown, but it is handy for keep some small object in it.
        increase inventory space when equipped.

description.trans:
Cool and fashionable Fanny Pack, signed by a legend called th' Rock himself from decades ago.
        increase in'entory space when equipped.
description.eng:
Cool and fashionable Fanny Pack, signed by a legend called The Rock himself from decades ago.
        increase inventory space when equipped.

description.trans:
An barnacle-covered Kindergarten lookin' Purple 'Explorer' Backpack, it has a name tag wit' th' previous owner's name "Dora" written on it, ye look fabulous wearin' it.
        increase in'entory space when equipped
description.eng:
An old Kindergarten looking Purple 'Explorer' Backpack, it has a name tag with the previous owner's name "Dora" written on it, you look fabulous wearing it.
        increase inventory space when equipped

description.trans:
An standard issue office case, it has a label wit' whit print wit' "Arasaka" on it, 
        while it be specious and has some high tech compartment and slots fer document storage, it be not not very suitable fer carryin' weapons
        increase in'entory space when equipped
description.eng:
An standard issue office case, it has a label with whit print with "Arasaka" on it, 
        while it is specious and has some high tech compartment and slots for document storage, it is not not very suitable for carrying weapons
        increase inventory space when equipped

description.trans:
An military used bot designed t' carry yer equipments and follows ye autonomously,
        wit' 'tis six strong legs that imitates th' movement o' spiders and a advance onboard AI, 
        it can follow ye swiftly and quietly while it avoids get in th' way o' whatever mission ye be performin'
description.eng:
An military used bot designed to carry your equipments and follows you autonomously,
        with it's six strong legs that imitates the movement of spiders and a advance onboard AI, 
        it can follow you swiftly and quietly while it avoids get in the way of whatever mission you are performing

description.trans:
A exploit module that intercepts global chat packages and modifies it, performin' Man-In-th'-Middle attack.
        Transforms all speech at global chat t' Corsair Speak. This effects all crewmates fer 10 minutes
description.eng:
A exploit module that intercepts global chat packages and modifies it, performing Man-In-The-Middle attack.
        Transforms all speech at global chat to Pirate Speak. This effects all players for 10 minutes

description.trans:
A exploit module that intercepts global chat packages and modifies it, performin' Man-In-th'-Middle attack.
        Transforms all speech at global chat t' l33t Speak. This effects all crewmates fer 10 minutes
description.eng:
A exploit module that intercepts global chat packages and modifies it, performing Man-In-The-Middle attack.
        Transforms all speech at global chat to l33t Sp34k. This effects all players for 10 minutes

description.trans:
A expwoit moduwe that intewcepts gwobaw chat packages and modifies it, pewfowming man-in-the-middwe attack.
         twansfowms aww speech at gwobaw chat to uwu speak. This effects aww pwayews fow 10 minutes
description.eng:
A expwoit moduwe that intewcepts gwobaw chat packages and modifies it, pewfowming man-in-the-middwe attack.
         twansfowms aww speech at gwobaw chat to uwu speak. This effects aww pwayews fow 10 minutes

description.trans:
Ye get some love, and ye get some love, and dinna spare the whip! tharr crewmates gets some love!.
        When used tharr crewmates loves each other
        This effects all crewmates fer 10 minutes
description.eng:
You get some love, and you get some love! everyone gets some love!.
        When used everyone loves each other
        This effects all players fow 10 minutes

description.trans: A shard stores default settin's and algorithm fer equipments, this be used fer factory-resettin' yer equipments
description.eng: A shard stores default settings and algorithm for equipments, this is used for factory-resetting your equipments

description.trans:
When used, skip 60 minutes on AFK tasks.
        must be used at AFK screen
description.eng:
When used, skip 60 minutes on AFK tasks.
        must be used at AFK screen

description.trans:
Worried th' Big Brother spyin' on ye while ye browse th' cyberspace?
        yer intercoms always get hacked by malicious attacks? 
        use CyberTunnel VPN t' protect and encrypt yer netrunnin' experience! 
        
        Once activated, ignores any chat exploit fer 1 hour
description.eng:
Worried the Big Brother spying on you while you browse the cyberspace?
        your intercoms always get hacked by malicious attacks? 
        use CyberTunnel VPN to protect and encrypt your netrunning experience! 
        
        Once activated, ignores any chat exploit for 1 hour

description.trans:
A shard that contains ad'ance exploits. 
        Can be used t' breach systems such as Shangri-la Data Fortress
description.eng:
A shard that contains advance exploits. 
        Can be used to breach systems such as Shangri-la Data Fortress

description.trans: An encrypted container wit' red, green decoration and a 'CyberSanta™' logo on the side of it.
description.eng: An encrypted container with red, green decoration and a 'CyberSanta™' logo on the side of it.

descriptionv3.trans: A shard that contains ad'ance exploits designed t' increase random drop chance o' high tier items. Gains additional drop chance o' Legendary (${legendaryChance}%) 'n Epic (${epicChance}%) items when unlockin' Legendary containers (Nah stackable) fer ${time} minute. *IMPORTANT: The buff will only apply when the unlockin' process be started while the buff be active*.
descriptionv3.eng: A shard that contains advance exploits designed to increase random drop chance of high tier items. Gains additional drop chance of Legendary (${legendaryChance}%) and Epic (${epicChance}%) items when unlocking Legendary containers (Not stackable) for ${time} minute (Applies to all players). *IMPORTANT: The buff will only apply when the unlocking process is started while the buff is active*.

description.trans: A flash grenade that can be used to blind enemies. increasing your chance of escape by ${escape}%
description.eng: A flash grenade that can be used to blind enemies. increasing your chance of escape by ${escape}%

description.trans: Th' shard that there contains someone's memory an' experience. If used ye may gain ${levelName} experience from 'tis
description.eng: A shard that contains someone's memory and experience. If used you may gain ${levelName} experience from this

description.trans:
A secret key Fragment used t' brute-force a secret key.
                                Use th' Terminal at city center [Hub] t' brute-force a ${segmentDisplayName} secret key.
                                Ye can acquire each o' th' 3 required keys in each dungeon (both normal or challenge), 
                                when you have acquired the 3 keys, you may use Terminal to brute-force (Craft) the key to the next area
description.eng:
A secret key Fragment used to brute-force a secret key.
                                Use the Terminal at city center [Hub] to brute-force a ${segmentDisplayName} secret key.
                                You can acquire each of the 3 required keys in each dungeon (both normal or challenge),
                                when you acquired 3 keys, you may use Terminal to brute-force (Craft) a key to the next area

description.trans:
A ${typeName} cache contains information used fer Molecular 3D Printin', 
                    Ye can create a ${typeName} wit' th' [Molecular 3d Printer] at [Central Hub].
                    
                    Pro tip: th' level o' item ye get from printin' be determined by yer Printin' Rank,
                    so always print the trash ones first, as they cost less an' are useful to level up your Printing Rank
description.eng:
A ${typeName} cache contains information used for Molecular 3D Printing, 
                    You can create a ${typeName} with the [Molecular 3d Printer] at [Central Hub].
                    
                    Pro tip: The level of item you get from printing is determined by your Printing Rank,
                    so always print the trash ones first, as they cost less and useful to level up your Printing Rank

description.trans:
[Central Hub]
        One o' tharr busiest cities in tharr continent, 'ere ye can find all sorts o' scallywags from around tharr globe.
description.eng:
[Central Hub]
        One of the busiest cities in the continent. Here you can find all sorts of people from around the globe.

description.trans: Sail t' Hyperr Train Central Station
description.eng: Go to Hyper Train Central Station

tut.trans: Start yerr ad'enture ferr epic booty here
tut.eng: Start your adventure for epic loot here

tut.trans: Ye can complete AFK jobs t' increase yerr skills here
tut.eng: You can complete AFK jobs to increase your skills here

tut.trans: Ye can sell or buy items from otherr players here
tut.eng: You can sell or buy items from other players here

description.trans:
[Job Hub]
        'ere be many shops an' companies, n' it be tharr perfect location t' hone an' try out yerr skills.
description.eng:
[Job Hub]
        Here are many shops and businesses reside. The perfect location to hone and refine your skills.

description.trans:
[Playerr Market]
        Tharr famous market street in Shangri-La. Loads o' market stalls fill tharr street.
        Maybe ye can find somethin ye need orr set up shop yourself.
description.eng:
[Player Market]
        The famous market street in Shangri-La. Loads of market stalls fill the street.
        Maybe you can find something you need or set up shop yourself.

description.trans:
[Ad'enture]
        Usin tharr hyperloop, ye can tra'el at superr speed across tharr continent wit' ease.
description.eng:
[Adventure]
        Using the hyperloop, you can travel at supersonic speed across the continent with ease.

description.trans:
[Gan']
        Th' headquarter fer ye an' yer gang members t' plan an' execute yer next operation
description.eng:
[Gang]
        The headquarters for you and your gang members to plan and execute your next operation

cantEnterError.trans: Ye need t' join a gang t' enter 'tis area
cantEnterError.eng: You need to join a gang to enter this area

description.trans: Return t' ${mainHubName}
description.eng: Return to ${mainHubName}

description.trans: return t' ${segmentStationName}
description.eng: return to ${segmentStationName}

description.trans: Return t' Hyperr Train Station
description.eng: Return to Hyper Train Station

description.trans: Le'el ${segment} t' ${segmentMaxLevel}
description.eng: Level ${segment} to ${segmentMaxLevel}

description.trans:
Gatherr all 3 Key Fragments from tharr Dungeons ferr each zone in tharr pre'ious station, 
                    then sail t' [Terminal] at City Centerr [Hub] t' brute-force (Craft) tharr key required t' unlock 'tis area
description.eng:
Gather all 3 different Key Fragments from Dungeons in each 3 zones in previous station, 
                    then go to [Terminal] at City Center [Hub] to brute-force (Craft) the key required to unlock this area

tut.trans: Start wit' tharr le'el 1 t' 10 area
Continue here t' fight le'el 1 enemy
tut.eng: Continue here to fight level 1 enemy

description.trans: Go t' ${zoneName}
description.eng: Go to ${zoneName}

trans: Do ye wants t' buy Units, or use yer Units?
eng: Do you want to buy Units, or use your Units?

canAccessError.trans: Ye need at least level 3 to access unit exchange
canAccessError.eng: You need to be at least level 3 to access unit exchange

tut.trans: Ye can purchase global buff items 'ere
tut.eng: You can purchase global buff items here

trans: Ahoy! Donate t' get cosmetic perks 'n t' help support Free-t'-Win games like this one!
eng: Hi! Donate to get cosmetic perks and to help support Free-to-Win games like this one!

canAccessError.trans: Ye need at least level 3 to access cosmetic merchant
canAccessError.eng: You need to be at least level 3 to access cosmetic merchant

tut.trans: If ye liked tharr game, please consider donation :)
tut.eng: If you liked the game, please consider donation :)

trans: I'll print whatever ye wants if ye 'ave the cache!
eng: I'll print whatever you want if you have the cache!

tut.trans: Ye can use yer Cache t' print new equipment 'ere
tut.eng: You can use your Cache to print new equipment here

trans: Ye will find tharr best gear here, trust me self.
eng: You will find the best gear here, trust me.

trans: I'll help ye t' progress t' the next area!
eng: I'll help you to progress to the next area!

tut.trans:
T' progress t' tharr next area, ye need t' use Secret Key Fragments from dungeons, 
        an' use tharr Terminal t' Brute Force tharr key ferr next area
tut.eng:
To progress to the next area, you need to get Secret Key Fragments from dungeons, 
        and use the Terminal to Brute Force the key for next area

canAccessError.trans: Ye need t' be at le'el 5 t' access terminal
canAccessError.eng: You need to be at least level 5 to access terminal

description.trans: Dis be yerr personal computer, although 'tis a little outdated, it could get tharr job done wit' enough patience
description.eng: Your personal computer, although it's a little outdated, it can get the job done with enough patience

trans: Ahoy sprog... Come check out me booty.
eng: Hey kid... Come check out my goods.

trans: Ahoy. Wha' can I store fer ye?
eng: Welcome. What can I store for you?

canAccessError.trans: Ye need t' be at least le'el 5 t' access bank
canAccessError.eng: You need to be at least level 5 to access bank

trans: Insert a Calibration Core into the machine, 'n I shall help ye calibrate any o' yer equipment.
eng: Insert a Calibration Core into the machine, and I shall help you calibrate any of your equipment.

canAccessError.trans: Ye need t' be at least le'el 10 t' access Calibration Station
canAccessError.eng: You need to be at least level 10 to access Calibration Station

trans: Ahoy sprog, I be Lee, Ye know, ye don't 'ave t' carry everythin' ye owns in yer pockets.
eng: Hey kid, I'm Lee, You know, you don't have to carry everything you own in your pockets.

description.trans: A family run tradin' shop that lets ye trade with what they ha'e found while scavengin'
description.eng: A family run trading shop that lets you trade with what they have found while scavenging

canAccessError.trans: Ye need t' be at least le'el 10 t' access merchant
canAccessError.eng: You need to be at least level 10 to access merchant

description.trans: Fully automated recycler, capable o' recyclin' items t' their basic scrap form
description.eng: Fully automated recycler, capable of recycling items to their basic scrap form

description.trans:
An underground market filled with people with all kind of shady deals and rare loots.
        Print and sell your caches at the here to earn quick money
description.eng:
An underground market filled with people with all kind of shady deals and rare loots.
        Print and sell your caches here to earn quick money

description.trans: Impro'e yerr Printin' Rank without sacrificin tech scrap, will help increase tharr le'el o' yerr prints.
description.eng: Improve Printing Rank without sacrificing tech scrap, this may help to increase the level of your prints.

description.trans: Download useful data from a local body mod clinic t' craft higherr quality medical bots n' drones.
description.eng: Download useful data from a local body mod clinic to craft higher quality medical bots and drones.

description.trans: Tinkerr wit' ammunition, t' find more effecti'e ways o' craftin it.
description.eng: Tinker with ammunition, to find more effective ways of crafting it.

description.trans:
Re'erse engineerr tech scrap t' impro'e yerr Printin' Rank. 
        Ye’ll need t' sacrifice some o' yerr tech scrap.
description.eng:
Reverse engineer tech scrap to improve your Print Rank. 
        You’ll need to sacrifice some of your tech scrap.

description.trans: Engagin in crypto minin will earn ye Doubloons, howe'err due t' tharr intense use o' tharr Hash Processors, tharr Quantum Processin Unit, otherwise known as tharr QPU, will often burn out.
description.eng: Engaging in crypto mining will earn you Bitcoins, however due to the intense use of the Hash Processors, the Quantum Processing Unit, otherwise known as the QPU, will often burn out.

description.trans: Help gather and manage needed resources fer yer gang
description.eng: Help gather and manage needed resources for your gang

description.trans: Help reinforce and establish greater control o' Shangri-la city.
description.eng: Help reinforce and establish greater control of Shangri-la city.

description.trans: Decrypt memory shard ye found t' retrie'e useful intel
description.eng: Decrypt a memory shard to retrieve useful intel.

description.trans:
Konnichiwa!! ^___^
        Come play th' MEGA Pachinko! Wit' chance t' win HUGE EPIC rewards
        only fer 5000 btc per session, LIMITED TIME OFFER!!! <3<3<3
        ##Special thanks fer Militech fer sponsorin' this event##
description.eng:
Konnichiwa!! ^___^
        Come play the MEGA Pachinko! With chance to win HUGE EPIC rewards
        only 5000 btc per session, LIMITED TIME OFFER!!! <3<3<3
        ##Special thanks for Militech for sponsoring this event##

name.trans: Play MEGA Pachinko s plus pro max
name.eng: Play MEGA Pachinko s plus pro max

description.trans:
Konnichiwa!! UwU
        Are you feeling rich and lucky today?
        play now only 1,000,000 btc once (limited time special offer!) with 0.1% chance to win a EPIC item!
description.eng:
Konnichiwa!! UwU
        Are you feeling rich and lucky today?
        play now only 1,000,000 btc once (limited time special offer!) with 0.1% chance to win a EPIC item!

description.trans: Bribe go'ernment officials an' th' SLPD t' collect pirate fees from business owners an' citizens in Shangri-La. Yaaarrrrr, pass the grog! Maybe ye’ll get some EPIC items from them? (Exclusive t' th' Top 2 Gan's on th' Occupation Leaderboard
description.eng: Bribe government officials and the SLPD to collect protection fees from business owners and citizens in Shangri-La. Maybe you’ll get some EPIC items from them? (Exclusive to the Top 2 Gangs on the Occupation Leaderboard

description.trans:
Launch a collaborative attack in cyberspace targetin' th' Shangri-La Data Fortress.
If the attack succeeds, it’s possible to force the Data Fortress to transmit exploits to all cybernetically connected users.
description.eng:
Launch a collaborative attack in cyberspace targeting the Shangri-La Data Fortress.
If the attack succeeds, it’s possible to force the Data Fortress to transmit exploits to all cybernetically connected users.

description.trans:
[AFK Exp Farm]
        Deploys a AI t' dungeon ferr ye. Dis will use up a AI Core, they usually only just manage one voyage.
description.eng:
[AFK Exp Farm]
        Deploys an AI to dungeon for you. This will use up an AI Core, they usually only just manage the one trip.

tut.trans: Ye can use yerr AI Cores t' Auto-Farm enemies while ye be AFK
tut.eng: You can use your AI Core to Auto-Farm enemies while you AFK

description.trans:
[AFK Resource Gather]
                    Search aroun' in ${zoneName} and sca'enge fer useful items.
                    Who knows, maybe you'll get lucky!
description.eng:
[AFK Resource Gather]
                    Search around in ${zoneName} and scavenge for useful items.
                    Who knows, maybe you'll get lucky!

description.trans: Deal damage t' any enemy
description.eng: Deal damage to any enemy

description.trans: Acquire Bitcoins in any way
description.eng: Acquire Bitcoins in any way

description.trans: Recei'e exp from any source
description.eng: Receive exp from any source

description.trans: Kill any enemy
description.eng: Kill any enemy

description.trans: use molecular print to print any item cache
description.eng: use molecular print to print any item cache

description.trans: Join other crewmate's dungeon
description.eng: Join other player's dungeon

description.trans: Clear a challenge dungeon (can be co-op)
description.eng: Clear a challenge dungeon (can be co-op)

description.trans: Clear tharr dungeon (can be co-op)
description.eng: Clear any dungeon (can be co-op)

description.trans: Clear any dungeon wit 1 or more crewmates
description.eng: Clear any dungeon with 1 or more players

description.trans: Chat wit other crewmates, spam nay allowed
description.eng: Chat with other players, spam not allowed

description.trans: Open crate in dungeon
description.eng: Open crate in dungeon

description.trans: Place an item on tharr market
description.eng: Place an item on the market

enemyInRoomDoorError.trans: Ye cannot use door while there be still enemy in room
enemyInRoomDoorError.eng: You cannot use door while there is still enemy in room

enemyInCrateDoorError.trans: It be too dangerous t' search while there be still enemies broadside
enemyInCrateDoorError.eng: It is too dangerous to search while there are still enemies nearby

tut.trans:
Avast yarr matey! Dive into tharr dungeon t' plunder even more exp an' loot!
                        remember to buy some healing items! you don"t regen after fights in dungeon
tut.eng:
Are you ready? you can test your strength out with normal dungeon, the easiest one.
                        Remember to bring healing item! you won't heal after fights in dungeon

description.trans:
Recommended Le'el:　${maxLevel}+ wit' co-op
                    ${expMultiplier}x more EXP!
                    Challenge mode dungeon, extra booty an' exp.
                    Drops ${keyFragmentDisplayName}
                    Not advised t' enter if yer level is too low
description.eng:
Recommended Level: ${maxLevel}+ with co-op
                    ${expMultiplier}x more EXP!
                    Challenge mode dungeon, extra loot and exp.
                    Drops ${keyFragmentDisplayName}
                    Not advised to enter if your level is too low

tut.trans:
Be ye stron' enough? try out a Challenge Dungeon,
                        there be a stron admiral n' tons o' booty at tharr end waitin ferr ye!
                        Its recommended t' attempt dis wit' otherr crewmate.
tut.eng:
Are you strong enough? try it out on Challenge Dungeon,
                        there is a strong boss and tons of loot at the end waiting for you!
                        Its recommended to attempt this with other players.

description.trans:
Recommended Le'el:　${maxLevel}+ wit' co-op
                    ${expMultiplier}x more EXP!
                    Gan' mode dungeon, extra booty an' exp. 
                    Admiral drops are rare+ 
                    Not advised t' enter if yer level is too low
description.eng:
Recommended Level: ${maxLevel}+ with co-op
                    ${2.3}x more EXP! and 4~5x stronger enemies!
                    Gang mode dungeon, extra loot and exp.
                    *Not for the faint of heart*

buttonTut.trans:
Do ye think ye be strong enough, avast? take on stronger enemies in dungeon!
                        remember t' buy some healin' item! ye won't regen aft battle in dungeon
buttonTut.eng:
Do you think you are strong enough? take on stronger enemies in dungeon!
                        remember to buy some healing item! you won't regen after battle in dungeon

localFightCantUseItem.trans: You cannot use item during street fights, items are only available during dungeons
localFightCantUseItem.eng: You cannot use item during street fights, items are only available during dungeons

title.trans: How many would ye like t' purchase?
title.eng: How many would you like to purchase?

priceConfirm.trans: Ye are selling ${amountStr} ${itemName}(s), at tharr price o' ${priceStr} Per Item
priceConfirm.eng: You are selling ${amountStr} ${itemName}(s), at the price of ${priceStr} Per Item

totalConfirm.trans: If all o' them be sold, ye will earn ${total} Doubloon
totalConfirm.eng: If all items are sold, you will earn ${total} BitCoins

sellAmountModalTitle.trans: How many would ye like t' sell?
sellAmountModalTitle.eng: How many would you like to sell?

likeNotification.trans: ${likerName} has send you ${amount} respects for your skip
likeNotification.eng: ${likerName} has send you ${amount} respects for your skip

noEnoughSpace.trans: Ye ha'e no space in yer in'entory t' purchase this item
noEnoughSpace.eng: You have no space in your inventory to purchase this item

noEnoughMoney.trans: Ye dern't have enough ${CURRENCY} t' purchase this item
noEnoughMoney.eng: You do not have enough ${CURRENCY} to purchase this item

title.trans: How many would ye like t' purchase?
title.eng: How many would you like to purchase?

description.trans: Tharr be donate ${amount} Unit from yer account
description.eng: This will donate ${amount} Unit from your account

notEnough.trans: Aye! Ye no have Unit to donate, ye scallywag!
notEnough.eng: You do not have enough Unit to donate.

title.trans: Are ye sure ye wants t' block this crewmate?
title.eng: Are you sure you want to block this player?

title.trans: Please agree t' th' rules below before start chattin'
title.eng: Please agree to the rules below before start chatting

footer.trans: Ye be MUTED if ye breach any o' tharr rules
footer.eng: You will be MUTED if you breach any of the rules

footer2.trans: Full list o' rules can be found in Profile > Tutorials > Rules
footer2.eng: Full list of rules can be found in Profile > Tutorials > Rules

title.trans: Me understand an' Me will ne'er spam or break any o' th' chat rules
title.eng: I understand and I will never spam or break any of the chat rules

description.trans: Ye can contribute t' content like this an' many more too by editin' th' config files in our GitHub page.
description.eng: You can contribute to content like this and many more too by editing the config files in our GitHub page.

description1.trans: As this game be made by only one person, 'tis very difficult translate all languages correctly, but me be workin' on addin' more translations :)
description1.eng: As this game is made by only one person, it's very difficult translate all languages correctly, but I am working on adding more translations :)

description.trans: ye can change language anytime at th' settin's page
description.eng: You can change language anytime at the settings page

description.trans: Use unofficial translation
description.eng: Use unofficial translation

subTitle.trans: Congratulation, ye have leveled up yer ${levelName}!
subTitle.eng: Congratulation, you have leveled up your ${levelName}!

title1.trans: Me Cap'n Dexter, th' developer o' this game, an' Me be hopin' t' be knowin' yer experience so far.
title1.eng: I'm Dexter, the developer of this game, and I hope to know your experience so far.

title2.trans: How many stars fer ye t' give?
title2.eng: How many stars would you give?

title.trans: I be so sorry, please let me be knowin' whar I can improve
title.eng: I am so sorry, please let me know where I can improve

title1.trans: Blimey! thanks so much! Yaaarrrrr! im honored, please make it official by leavin' them on our store page :)
title1.eng: Wow, thanks so much! I'm honored, please make it official by leaving them on our store page :)

title2.trans: Yer good review be goin' t' help me very an' brin' more crewmate into our community!
title2.eng: Your good review is going to help me much and bring more players into our community!

welcomeMsg.trans: Welcome t' th' best Text MMORPG
welcomeMsg.eng: Welcome to the best Text MMORPG

description.trans: Ye can see tharr full tutorial at Profile > Tutorial tab
description.eng: You can see the full tutorial at Profile > Tutorial tab

description.trans: Please click reload t' continue
description.eng: Please click reload to continue

newbieTip.trans: Ye will not heal aft each fight in dungeon, remember t' use yer healin' items.
newbieTip.eng: You will not heal after each fight in dungeon, remember to use your healing items.

content2.trans: I be Cap'n Dexter, th' developer o' CyberCode Online.
content2.eng: I am Dexter, the developer of CyberCode Online.

content3.trans: If ye have some spare change it would be very helpful if ye could donate t' help wit continued support an' development o' th' game.
content3.eng: If you have some spare change it would be very helpful if you could donate to help with continued support and development of the game.

content4.trans: Please only donate if ye be comfortable, all benefits be designed t' be fair fer all crewmates an' will not give an edge in gameplay.
content4.eng: Please only donate if you are comfortable, all benefits are designed to be fair for all players and will not give an edge in gameplay.

permanentDescription.trans: This title will never expire.\nIt stays with your account forever.
permanentDescription.eng: This title will never expire.\nIt stays with your account forever.
